means: [医]天门冬属：百合科植物的一属，芦笋(A.officinalis)的根是一种缓和利尿药，有人声称，在食此植物后，在尿中排出甲硫醇，另有人认为其有气味的物质是天门冬素-琥珀胺酸单酰胺

sentence.Network_en: Trim any tough or woody stalks from the asparagus.
sentence.Network_cn: 剪掉芦笋上粗硬或老掉的梗子。

sentence.Network_en: Anton the chef concocts a sensual coupling of lobster and asparagus.
sentence.Network_cn: 厨师安东用龙虾和芦笋搭配，制作出了一道口感很好的菜肴。

sentence.Network_en: Layer the potatoes, asparagus and salmon in the tin.
sentence.Network_cn: 把土豆、芦笋和大麻哈鱼分层装入罐头内。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek asparagos

entry.def: Asparagus is a vegetable that is long and green and has small shoots at one end. It is cooked and served whole.

means.word_mean: 1. plant whose succulent young shoots are cooked and eaten as a vegetable
2. edible young shoots of the asparagus plant
